mapper.update: update commlikes set type=#{type} where usernum=#{usernum} and commnum=#{commnum}
mapper.select: select * from commlikes where usernum=#{usernum} and commnum=#{commnum}
select count(*) cnt from commlikes where commnum=#{commnum} and type=#{type}

select c.commnum, cl.usernum u1, c.usernum u2, cl.type, w.title, ep.epnum, ep.contnum from commlikes cl, comments c, episode ep, webcontents w where cl.commnum=#{commnum} and cl.commnum=c.commnum and c.epinum=ep.epinum and ep.contnum=w.contnum
